Designing everything from story & characters to page layouts, colour, typography & artwork.

Lead Graphic Designer
Bright Oak Creative - Marketing agency
Nov 2023 - Jan 2025
• Creative Direction & Leadership: Led a team of designers, reviewing & refining work before submission.
• Ad Campaign Design: Designed multi-format social media ads, balancing static & motion graphics to drive engagement.
• Illustration: Created custom illustrations & product mockups tailored to each client’s unique identity.
• Photo Editing & Enhancement: Edited & optimised photos from shoots applying edits for final assets.
• Brand Growth & Impact: Contributed to the agency’s success, including securing high-value client retainer deals through consistently strong creative work.
• Designed digital assets: Across websites, email campaigns, & social platforms, adapting layouts for different formats & audiences.

Graphic Designer
North Harbor Studios - Video Production Company
Mar 2021 - Nov 2023
• Illustration for Animation: Created illustrated assets for various animated projects, designing characters, backgrounds & visual elements in various styles.
• Branding & Promotional Design: Logos, podcast covers & promotional materials.
• Web & Digital Design: Developed layouts for websites, landing pages ensuring engaging user experiences.
• Print & Editorial Design: Designed brochures, booklets & educational materials, ranging from executive documents to children’s activity books.
• Photography & Video Editing: Assisted on shoots & edited final videos together.
